parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The character array that is the initial value of the string.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The string that is the initial value of the string.

methods.name: length
methods.description: Returns the length of the string.

methods.name: charAt

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index of the character to return.

methods.description: Returns the character at the specified index.

methods.name: substring

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The starting index of the substring.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The ending index of the substring.

methods.description: Returns a substring of the string.

methods.name: concat
methods.description: Concatenates the specified string to the end of this string.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Compares this string to the specified object.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code of this string.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this string.
